title.rendered: STEDI MCX25 MOTORCYCLE LED DRIVING FLOOD LIGHT

content.rendered:
Hyper Output Motorcycle Auxiliary LED Driving Lights. CREE LED Additional Driving Flood Wide beam.

30M SPREAD SMOOTH BEAM

25W LED

OVERVIEW

After opening up a category for motorcycle application LED Lights the response has overwhelmed us. Included in this range is our MCX25 Series lights which are available in both a flood and spot beam.

PERFORMANCE

Blaring a single 25w LED you will find the spot beam will provide the additional distance over your factory lights for brighter visibility of the road ahead and the flood beam providing clearer vision on the shoulders of the road.

APPLICATION

With a sleek design and solid structure, the MCX25 Series can mount to multiple locations around your bike whilst keeping a factory look overall. Small enough to run the desired spot and floodlight combination to give you an even spread.

DETAILS

MXC25 Flood Beam is capable of 1,950 Lumens per light and has 2 x the net light volume of the average halogen motorcycle bulb. Couple this with an ultra wide 30m full width spread right out to 90m and you have exceedingly capable auxiliary lighting setup for your road bike, touring or off-road bike.

The slightly warm 5000K CCT along with it high fidelity 75 CRI gives exceptional visual acuity.

KEY FEATURES 

  • Die Cast Aluminium Alloy Housing
  • CREE Xlamp MT-G LED
  • Warm 5000K CCT
  • Ingress Protection Rating IP68 – Submersible upto 3m
  • Lexan Polycarbonate Lens
  • Stainless Steel Mounting Brackets
  • Spread Beam

SPECIFICATIONS

LED POWER INPUT 25 WATTS
HOUSING MATERIAL Die Cast Aluminium Alloy
CURRENT DRAW 1.6a @ 13.6v
RAW LUMENS 1,950Lm
OPERATING VOLTAGE 9v to 36v
INGRESS PROTECTION IP68
LED CHIP CREE LED
COLOUR TEMPERATURE 6000K
LENS Lexan Polycarbonate
BEAM TYPE Flood
LIFE SPAN 50,000
WEIGHT 0.550kg

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 25w Spread LED Motorcycle Driving Light
  • Stainless Steel Fastener Kit.
  • Male and Female Deutsch Connector with Wire Tails

excerpt.rendered: Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
